name: Leaving Brandonville
description:
Welcome to Brandonville! Wait... why are you trying to leave so soon? Well, the only way you're going to get out of this town is by finding the taxi. Good luck out there.

W A S D to move.

Once you press a direction, you will walk until you hit an obstacle.

F for fullscreen.

Enter, Space or Click to play.

This game was made in under 72 hours from beginning to end as part of a "5 Devs, 1 Art Pack" challenge.  Take a relaxing stroll through Brandonville to find the taxi and get out of town. But be careful, it's easy to get lost in this place.

Art Pack:  Kenny Urban RPG

Music:  Kevin MacLeod - Itty Bitty, Kevin MacLeod - Pixelland

Game Engine:  Construct 3
